name: Building Construction
description: Companies involved in the construction of buildings, including residential, commercial, and industrial projects, from foundation to finish.

name: Heavy Civil Construction
description: Firms specializing in large-scale infrastructure projects, such as roads, bridges, airports, and public transportation systems.

name: Specialty Trade Contractors
description: Companies providing specialized services, including electrical, plumbing, HVAC, and roofing, to support construction projects.

name: Construction Materials and Supplies
description: Manufacturers and distributors of materials and products used in construction, such as lumber, drywall, and building hardware.

name: Construction Equipment and Machinery
description: Companies producing and distributing heavy machinery, tools, and equipment used in construction, such as cranes, excavators, and bulldozers.

name: Architecture and Engineering Services
description: Firms providing design, planning, and engineering services for construction projects, including architectural design, structural engineering, and project management.

name: Construction Management and Consulting
description: Companies offering project management, consulting, and advisory services to construction projects, including cost estimation, scheduling, and risk management.

name: Land Development and Subdivision
description: Companies involved in the development of raw land, including site preparation, subdivision, and infrastructure installation.

name: Demolition and Wrecking
description: Firms specializing in the safe demolition and removal of existing structures, including buildings, bridges, and other infrastructure.

name: Environmental Remediation and Abatement
description: Companies providing services to mitigate environmental hazards, including asbestos removal, lead abatement, and hazardous waste disposal.

name: Construction Technology and Software
description: Providers of technology solutions, including software, hardware, and services, to support construction project management, collaboration, and data analysis.
